head_commit.message:
[RFC] VPN-4918 Refactor Controller and move connectivity logic to Connection Manager (#7269)

* Controller refactor RFC

* spell check

* Remove controller states, update diagram

Add feedback from talking to Baku

* fixup! Remove controller states, update diagram

* fixup! Remove controller states, update diagram

* fixup! Remove controller states, update diagram

* RFC feedback from Bea

* Update ConnectionState

* Apply suggestions from code review

Co-authored-by: Beatriz Rizental <beatriz.rizental@gmail.com>

* Remove On/Off states, add unstable, introduce the bool concept

* add ConnectionStateIdle and elaborate on the metrics

* Add link to Timer epic

* Add scalable to .dictionary

* fixup! Add scalable to .dictionary

---------

Co-authored-by: Beatriz Rizental <beatriz.rizental@gmail.com>
